config.targetLanguage.description: Target translation language code (e.g., en, ja, ko, fr, de, etc.)

webview.pathConfig.title: Path Configuration
webview.sourcePath.label: Source Path to Translate
webview.sourcePath.placeholder: Select or enter file/directory path to translate
webview.sourcePath.help: You can enter file path or directory path, supports relative and absolute paths
webview.outputPath.label: Output Path for Generated Files
webview.outputPath.placeholder: Select or enter output path for translated files
webview.outputPath.help: Translated files will be saved to this path, will be created automatically if not exists
webview.promptEnhancement.title: Prompt Enhancement
webview.customPrompt.label: Custom Prompt
webview.customPrompt.placeholder: Enter custom translation prompt, this will replace the default translation instruction.
webview.customPrompt.help: Leave empty to use default translation prompt. You can use {targetLanguage} as a placeholder, which will be replaced with the actual target language
webview.status.configSourcePath: Please configure the source path first
webview.status.configOutputPath: Please configure the output path first

settings.inputDirectory.help: Directory where files to be translated are located, supports relative and absolute paths

settings.outputDirectory.label: Output Directory
settings.outputDirectory.help: Directory to save translated files, can be relative or absolute path
settings.preserveFormatting.label: Preserve Markdown formatting
settings.translateCodeBlocks.label: Translate comments in code blocks
